clues.text:

starring for Corman--in "The Intruder"

When he leaves office, he will be the oldest mayor of New York City since consolidation in 1898

rounds.text: The verse from the Sermon on the Mount following "Judge not, that ye be not judged" inspired this Bard comedy title
